question: who has won the mens singles title in the australian open tennis tournament
vanilla_rag_result:
The following players have won the Men's Singles title at the Australian Open tennis tournament based on the provided passages:

1. John Bromwich - 1939 Australian Championships
2. Pete Sampras - 1994 Australian Open
3. Novak Djokovic - 
   - 2011 Australian Open
   - 2015 Australian Open
   - 2016 Australian Open

Andy Murray was a finalist in multiple years but did not win the title.
